TopicTitle: V1.0 Cannot Load Into Main Menu

Articles.Content:
System:

  • Windows 7 64bit
  • Intel 2600k no overclock
  • Nvidia 560ti no overclock, current driver
  • 16GB RAM
  • Game Installed on 120GB SSD
  • Steam Game Cache Verified
  • Fresh/Clean Game Install, no mods or additional files
  • Game Version: v1.0.0.830

Issue:

  • Launch Game in 32-bit mode
  • Loading screen progress bar does not finish, approximately 50% loaded then screen freezes up
  • main menu music starts playing while on frozen loading screen
  • Game Crashes

Previously, I was able to play the game with only a few crashes in 64bit mode. I turned off 64-bit mode to remedy that issue. The above issue is where I currently stand. I've included a download for my complete Crash Folder thingy here via Google Drive.

If any further information is needed, or if downloads are not acceptable, just let me know

Edited April 27, 2015 by Pravus_Obzen

The log has a crash and s stacktrace at the bottom, it says something about the Unity cursor, I've not seen this before so can't be sure what's happening.

As a guess I'd say reboot and try again, this one looks tricky to figure out.

Ah, I forgot a detailed. While stuck on the loading screen and listening to the main menu music, I clicked the mouse, and then the game crashed. I did a system reboot, another super clean reinstall of the game, and everything seems to be working. If my problem resurfaces, I will post here again. Thanks Sal!

Seems i still have my issue. Doesnt matter what i do, the game will crash in a few moments after the loading screen. Verify Steam game cache seems to find a few files to replace, but still, i crash. I updated my above google drive link with more folders available to download.
